string.name: about_me
string.p: I am Devanand S B currently pursuing B.Sc in Computer Science at Sacred Heart College, Tirupattur. I am very eager to learn new things in the field of technology. I am very much interested in Android App Backend Development.

string.name: about_certifications
string.p: I have completed Google certified Digital marketing course. I did my internship at Microsoft Corporation via Foxmula Technologies in the role of Android Developer. I have created two certification courses in udemy on Linux and Python.
